Key Match Events: Victor Wembanyama intercepted a crucial pass from Nikola Jokic with just 4 seconds remaining, helping the Spurs hold onto their slim lead and clinch the win.
Wembanyama finished with 35 points and 18 rebounds, leading his team to victory.
Nikola Jokic delivered an exceptional performance, scoring 41 points, grabbing 18 rebounds, and providing 9 assists.
With just 17 seconds left on the clock, San Antonio led by a single point, giving Denver a chance to steal the game.
Jokic attempted to pass the ball to a teammate, but Wembanyama made a crucial steal and quickly passed it to Devin Vassell.
Devin Vassell scored a layup that sealed the victory for the Spurs.
Michael Porter Jr. of Denver missed a 34-foot three-pointer in the dying moments, which would have forced overtime.
Porter finished the game with 22 points, and the Nuggets' three-game winning streak was snapped.
